title: Can we get some better champs?!?!?!?!?
body: Aurelion Sol and Jhin... FAIL!!!! Thats all.

replies.body:
I disagree.  I think both Jhin and Aurelion sol are great champs.  

Both have pretty cool personalities and overall thematic identities.  Both have cool kits with clearly defined strengths and weaknesses and I personally find both fun to play.  

If you don't like playing them then so be it (I personally never touched illaoi again after my first game with her)  but I wouldn't say they failed.
Please don't confuse a certain champion's kit with your inexperience in them.
Ive actually done very well with both champs. but theyre nothing near as good as previous champs. Just plain bad.

Your name fits so well XDDD

that is all
The fact that you are complaining about two difficult to play champs speaks volumes.
